original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 322.55/65 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 322.55/65 to the US dollar on Thursday from 322.80/90 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/55 percent from 13.40/55 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026, closed at 13.70/85 percent from 13.80/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.80/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 14.15/20 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.07.2029 closed at 14.25/35 percent from 14.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/30 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.20/35 percent from 14.25/40 percent. (Colombo/Jan11/2024)
